About
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth-service/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { isAdmin: boolean = false; constructor(private authService: AuthService) { this.authService.isAdmin.subscribe( isAdmin => this.isAdmin = isAdmin ); } }
